title: Another Plerd Blog
user_comment: This feed allows you to read the posts from this site in any feed reader that supports the JSON Feed format. To add this feed to your reader, copy the following URL — http://localhost//feed.json — and add it your reader.

items.title: Metatags
items.content_html: This file sets up some attributes that should cause some social media tags to get created in the resulting HTML, under the right circumstances.
